name: Ernest and the eternal night
description:
Welcome!!

Accompany Ernest on his adventure to bring light back to the world, explore, fight and accept the challenge that we propose in a 3D world mixed with 2D, with a variety of enemies, attacks, traps, special effects, bosses and much more...

Features:

Currently the game offers 1 complete and fully playable level.

  • Kinematics
  • Three different attacks 
  • Shield projectile blocking 
  • Slide 
  • Double jump 
  • Traps 
  • Boss fight
Game engine version

Unreal Engine 4.27

Programmer

José Manuel Ródenes Silvestre

Note:

Please comment bugs to correct them in the next updates, thanks.
